item.title: Favorite Johor Food Places
item.author: Author
item.description: This is a listing of my favorite food places in Johor. Laksa Restoran Yew Swee 友水餐室 Address: 64, Jalan Harimau Tarum, Taman Century, 80300 Johor Bahru, Johor W.W. Laksa House 水塘。辣沙 Address: 36A1, Jalan Kolam Air, Taman Kolam Air, 80100 Johor Bahru, Johor Wonton Mee Restoran HW 海威云吞面 Address: 68, Jalan Abiad, Taman Maju Jaya, 80400 Johor Bahru, Johor Kedai Kopi Xuu Yau 品苑云吞面 Address: 54, Jalan Tan Hiok Nee, 80000 Johor Bahru, Johor
